english: The institute publishes a fortnightly bulletin
chinese: 这学会会出版一份双周刊的报刊。

english: The one and only leslie cheung is a book presenting a complete account on leslie s short but brilliant life
chinese: 电影双周刊与lesliecheung cyberworld送给哥哥最"有heart "的一份礼物

english: Moreover , the internet version of offbeat , the force s full - colour fortnightly newspaper , was revamped during the year to make downloading easier and faster
chinese: 年内，警队全彩色印刷的双周刊《警声》革新了其网页，让读者下载资料时倍加方便快捷。

english: It is a free , healthy bi - weekly for teenagers through which we hope to offer guidance to perceive the environment from different angles and encouragement to be original and to attempt to discover infinite possbilities in life
chinese: 是一本免费的青少年双周刊，我们希望能藉著健康正面的讯息引导年轻人以多角度体会身边事物，并鼓励他们多创作多尝试，发掘生命无限的可能性
双周刊造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: To further publicise police - related information effectively , pprb continued to update the contents and improve the presentation of force publications , including the bi - weekly newspaper offbeat , the jpc monthly newsletter and police in figures leaflet
chinese: 该科不断改善各种警队刊物，致力向市民传递有关警队的最新资讯，当中包括《警声》双周刊、 《少年警讯》月刊和《警方统计数字》单张。
